Mon8: You're a good person @. Also a good friend to an old man like me.#$e#I thank you for your company.$h

Tue10: I recall the time where Lola and I visited the Ruby Islands before. They had an amazing beach!#$e#In there, we learned how to forge weapons with use of gems. Ikor was an old friend of ours, a famouse blacksmith!#$e#I wonder how's he is doing nowadays.$h

Thu10: Lola woke up with coughs of blood... We immediately called Doctor Harvey..$s#$e#He said that Lola has some case of Bronchitis...$s#$e#I'm just worried @..$s#$e#Excuse me for a moment.$s

And well. Things started there.$h
